coreAtributes.authorTag: Embossed into the leather are the words "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks"
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's dress belt
coreAtributes.description: A thick leather stomach belt supported by a thinner shoulder strap. Although it once served as a sword belt, its role is now largely ceremonial.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tighten)] the dress belt around [npc.her] waist and [npc.verb(thread)] excess through the buckle frame before inserting the double prongs through the closest adjustment hole. [npc.she] then [npc.verb(adjust)] the shoulder strap and [npc.verb(secure)] it in a similar fashion.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tighten)] the dress belt around [npc2.namePos] waist and [npc.verb(thread)] excess through the buckle frame before inserting the double prongs through the closest adjustment hole. [npc.she] the [npc.verb(adjust)] the shoulder strap and [npc.verb(secure)] it in a similar fashion.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tighten)] the dress belt around [npc2.namePos] waist as much as possible and hastily [npc.verb(thread)] excess through the buckle frame before inserting the double prongs through the closest adjustment hole. [npc.she] then [npc.verb(does)] much the same with the shoulder strap.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbuckle)] [npc.her] dress belt and its shoulder strap before taking it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbuckle)] [npc2.namePos] dress belt and its shoulder strap before taking it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(unbuckle)] [npc2.namePos] dress belt and its shoulder strap before tearing the whole thing away from [npc2.namePos] waist.
